channel.title: [Added] Create Org. Identifier XI-IATI-AIAS for the Administração de Infra-Estruturas de Águas e Saneamento (Mozambique)
channel.description:
The Administração de Infra-Estruturas de Águas e Saneamento of Mozambique requires the following information to be added on their behalf to the IATI Organisation Identifier Codelist at http://iatistandard.org/201/codelists/IATIOrganisationIdentifier/
Code: XI-IATI-AIAS
Name: Administração de Infra-Estruturas de Águas e Saneamento
Description: AIAS manages the property of the secondary public systems for water supply and for the residual water drainage public systems in Mozambique promoting their autonomous efficient and financially feasible operational management through assignment to private operators or other third party entities.
URL: http://www.aias.gov.mz/

item.title: [Added] Create Org. Identifier XI-IATI-AIAS for the Administração de Infra-Estruturas de Águas e Saneamento (Mozambique)
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
The IATI tech team approved this addition to the XI-IATI Organisation identifier codelist as a stable identifiers for departments or agencies in Mozambique is currently not available.

Read full topic
